title: "Deep learning tool for sarcopenia on CT: L1 versus L3 vertebral level"
excerpt: "According to ARRS’ American Journal of Roentgenology (AJR), use of the L1 vertebral level—typically included on both chest and abdominal CT examinations—rather than the L3 level expands the reach of opportunistic CT screening for sarcopenia."
